Question about aquiring the Centaur.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Question about aquiring the Centaur.
By Azulazulazula on Saturday, February 11, 2012 - 11:43 am:

Today, while playing, I went to Mandy on Feb, Week 1. It's been like two years since I've went out to get Centaur, so I forgot it had to be between the months March and August. So, I reset and went through my full training cycle (2 months), and was set to go in April, when the errantry sale notice came. So, my question is, can you get the Centaur on a sale month? Of course, I'm going out to get it now, so if I return with the spear, I'll post it.

By Azulazulazula on Saturday, February 11, 2012 - 11:45 am:

OK, just went to Mandy (my Baku learned Tongue Slap! Yay!), and came back with a spear. So, sale doesn't affect the chances of getting a spear.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, February 11, 2012 - 08:07 pm:
